Description: Necklace (?) consisting of a blue glazed composition pendant in the form of a scarab, with elytra marked and green glazed composition wings attached by means of cord (only one now remaining), suspended from a string of blue and green glazed composition and glass globular, short cylinder with two convex ends and disc beads (one incomplete dark blue glass bugle bead is also included), one large and one small fragment of glazed composition are also associated with this object.
